# How to run

```bash
make test
```

# How to use

Read `example.cpp`, only 36 lines of code.

```c++
f() {
    for (int i = 0; i < 1e1; i ++) {
        time_nested("x", [&]() {
            for (int j = 0; j < loop_count; j ++) {
                x += (i + 1) * (j + 1);
            }
        });
        time_nested("y", [&]() {
            x = x ^ (x + x);
            this_thread::sleep_for(chrono::milliseconds(10));
        });
    }
}
time_nested("b", [&]() {
    for (int i = 0; i < 1e1; i++) {
        f(1e5);
    }
});
```
